channel.title: CVE Feed for Latepoint -- LatePoint
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Latepoint -- LatePoint

item.title: CVE-2024-43945|2024-10-21T11:43:56.479Z -- latepoint -- latepoint
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Latepoint LatePoint allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects LatePoint: from n/a through 4.9.91.

item.title: CVE-2024-43992|2024-09-18T14:23:46.069Z -- latepoint -- latepoint
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Latepoint LatePoint allows Stored XSS.This issue affects LatePoint: from n/a through 4.9.91.
